hero_description: With Wawa Cash, send money to your loved ones in just a few clicks. Fast, reliable, and secure, our service connects you to those who matter, wherever they are in the world.
pourquoi_description: Sending money from one country to another is a sensitive operation that requires a reliable transfer solution. Wawa Cash was designed to meet these requirements.
securite_transactions_description: Your transactions are protected by the latest encryption and security technologies.
facilite_utilisation_description: An intuitive interface and a simplified process to send money in a few clicks.
tarifs_transparents_description: The pricing grid is clear and available before each send. You have full knowledge of sending fees, the amount sent, and the amount received by your loved ones.
fiabilite_service_description: A proven and reliable service for smooth transfers, every time.
rapidite_envoi_description: Transfers are processed in real-time or very short delays. No more long waiting times, your loved ones receive money in record time.
assistance_clientele_description: Our team is available to help you at every step of your transfer.
besoin_envoyer_argent: Need to send money? Do it with confidence with Wawa Cash.
transferer_argent_simple: Transferring money abroad has never been easier. With Wawa Cash, send money in a few steps, without stress or hidden fees.
faqs_description: Find quick answers to your most frequent questions about Wawa Cash, our services, security, and much more.
oups_perdu_title: Oops, are you a little lost?
oups_perdu_description: It seems you've taken an unexpected path. Don't panic, we're here to guide you in the right direction.
page_introuvable_title: Oops! The page you are looking for cannot be found.
page_introuvable_description: It seems you followed a broken link or the page has been moved.
a_propos_wawacash_p1: Wawa Cash is a payment solution designed for the African diaspora. Our mission: {{mission}}
a_propos_wawacash_mission: to make money transfers to Africa simple, fast, and secure.
a_propos_wawacash_p2: Every day, thousands of Africans support their families or invest back home. Wawa Cash simplifies these transfers with a modern, reliable, and accessible platform for everyone.
entreprise_agreee_title: A licensed company, a guarantee of trust
entreprise_agreee_description: Behind Wawa Cash is a certified company, respecting international financial security standards. We place security and transparency at the heart of everything.
securite_maximale_description: Your transactions are protected by advanced encryption protocols to ensure the confidentiality of your data.
conformite_garantie_description: Our systems are regularly audited to ensure total compliance and reliability of our services.
suivi_temps_reel_description: Keep control over every send with instant tracking, from the click of send to the receipt of funds.
notre_vision_description: Every transfer is more than a transaction — it's a link, an act of love and solidarity. Our ambition is clear: to make Wawa Cash the bridge between the African diaspora and their families, through a fluid and accessible experience.
contactez_nous_description: At Wawa Cash, we are always listening. A question, a need for assistance, or feedback? Our team is here for you.
centre_aide_description: Consult our 24/7 FAQ to find quick answers to your questions.
form_consent: By submitting this form, you agree that Wawa Cash will use your data to respond to your request. Consult our {{privacyLink}} and our {{termsLink}} for more information.
suivez_wawacash_description: Be the first to know about Wawa Cash news, our latest product updates, and much more by following us on our social networks.
footer_disclaimer: This service is offered to you by WawaCash, its various entities such as WawaCash Canada, a company registered in Canada under registration number XXXXXXXX, as well as its various partners. For more information, you can consult the general conditions of access to WawaCash and our personal data policy.
services_hero_description: At Wawa Cash, we have rethought the way you send, receive, and save your money. Our solution combines simplicity, security, and freedom to offer you more than just a service, a true companion for managing your daily money.
services_overview_description: Whether you are here or abroad, Wawa Cash brings you closer to your loved ones. Send, receive, and manage your money with confidence, with total transparency at every step.
transfert_argent_p1: Send money from the diaspora simply and hassle-free with Wawa Cash. Thanks to your Wawa Send wallet, transfer:
transfert_argent_li1: To a Mobile Money account (MTN, Moov, Orange, etc.) to support your loved ones,
transfert_argent_li2: Or to another Wawa Send wallet for instant transfers.
transfert_argent_p2: Two options, one promise: simplicity, speed, and security. Each transfer is tracked in real-time, with clear notifications at every step.
reception_argent_p1: Receive your money instantly and without complication with Wawa Cash. Whether it's family support or a payment, everything is done quickly and securely. Your Wawa Send wallet allows you to:
reception_argent_li1: Receive from another Wawa Send account,
reception_argent_p2: No delays, no hidden fees. Your money remains in good hands: yours.
epargne_argent_p1: With Wawa Cash, saving becomes simple and flexible. Your savings wallet allows you to set aside money at your own pace, without formalities.
epargne_argent_p2: Whether for a project or personal security, your money is protected, available, and transparent. A true digital safe, always under your control.
gestion_portefeuille_p1: With Wawa Cash, manage your money simply and securely. Track your transfers, control your expenses, and stay in control of your finances wherever you are.
gestion_portefeuille_p2: Wawa Cash is more than an app. It's your complete financial management tool, from transfer to savings.
reseau_diaspora_title: A network connecting the diaspora to Africa
reseau_diaspora_p1: Our network already covers Côte d'Ivoire, Mali, Senegal, Benin, Cameroon, Guinea, DRC, Niger, Togo, and Burkina Faso, with continuous expansion.
reseau_diaspora_p2: Join those who trust us for their daily transfers.
faqs_hero_description: Find quick answers to your most frequent questions about Wawa Cash, our services, security, and much more.
creer_compte_wawacash: How to create a WawaCash account?
support_hero_description: You will find answers to most of your questions on our <faqsLink>FAQ</faqsLink> page. If you still can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us to learn more.
faq_a1: Wawa Cash is a fast, secure, and reliable money transfer platform, allowing you to send money to your loved ones anywhere in the world in just a few clicks.
faq_a2: Wawa Send is our dedicated international money transfer service, ensuring your funds reach their destination quickly and securely.
faq_q3: Which countries are served by Wawa Cash?
faq_a3: Wawa Cash serves a wide range of countries worldwide. You can view the complete list of available countries on our services page.
faq_q4: How to create a Wawa Cash account?
faq_a4: To create a Wawa Cash account, download our mobile application from the Play Store or App Store, then follow the simple and quick registration steps.
faq_q5: What documents are required to open an account?
faq_a5: To open an account, you will generally need a valid ID (identity card, passport) and proof of residence. Requirements may vary depending on your country.
faq_q6: Can I send money without a bank account?
faq_a6: Yes, Wawa Cash offers options to send money even if you don't have a bank account, via our local payment partners.
faq_a7: Transfer fees are calculated based on the amount sent and the destination country. Our pricing schedule is transparent and displayed before each transaction.
faq_a8: Absolutely. We use advanced encryption protocols and comply with GDPR standards to ensure the confidentiality and security of your data.
faq_q9: What to do in case of a problem with a transfer?
faq_a9: In case of a problem, please contact our customer service via the contact form or by phone. Our support team is available to assist you.
tarifs_page_description: Discover our clear and straightforward pricing. With Wawa Cash, you always know how much you send and how much your loved ones receive.
tarifs_standard_description: Competitive fees for your regular transfers. Ideal for supporting your loved ones daily.
tarifs_premium_description: Need speed? Opt for our premium service with reduced processing times.
tarifs_entreprise_description: Solutions tailored for businesses and high-volume transactions. Contact us for a personalized offer.
contact_address: 220 Laurel Rd, Sharon Hill, PA 19079, USA

Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization from WawaCash Inc.

mentions_legales_donnees_personnelles_p2: For any information or to exercise your rights regarding the processing of personal data, you can consult our {{privacyPolicyLink}}.
mentions_legales_cookies_p1: The wawacash.com website uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. By browsing our site, you consent to the use of these cookies.
mentions_legales_cookies_p2: For more information on the use of cookies and how to manage them, please consult our {{cookiesPolicyLink}}.
mentions_legales_droit_applicable_p1: These legal notices are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute and in the absence of an amicable agreement, the dispute will be brought before the French courts in accordance with the applicable rules of jurisdiction.
